atk_abil: Normal Attack: Launches a wind blade and attacks up to 4 enemies, stunning them for a short period of time.
Skill Attack: Create several whirlwinds to levitate enemies in the air and damage them.
Special Ability 1: Immune to knock-back attacks (Not pushed back when hit by knock-back attack)
Special Ability 2: Increases movement and attack speed of elf and human units by 2%.
Special Ability 3: Increases the basic speed of the game by 2%.

Inner Passion: Increases all abilities (attack/defense/HP) of units by 2 levels. ([Inner passion] can only be used in stages. [Inner passion] is accrued when applied, but the unit abilities cannot increase to more than +100 level. This is activated even when units are in the Time Shop.)
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Launches a wind blade and attacks up to 4 enemies, stunning them for a short period of time.
Skill Attack: Create several whirlwinds to levitate enemies in the air and damage them.
Special Ability 1: Immune to knock-back attacks (Not pushed back when hit by knock-back attack)
Special Ability 2: Increases movement and attack speed of elf and human units by 6%.
Special Ability 3: Increases the basic speed of the game by 5%.

Inner Passion: Increases all abilities (attack/defense/HP) of units by 5 levels. ([Inner passion] can only be used in stages. [Inner passion] is accrued when applied, but the unit abilities cannot increase to more than +100 level. This is activated even when units are in the Time Shop.)

buffs.description: Increases all abilities (attack/defense/HP) of units even if Sylphid is in the Time Shop. (Only applies to stages) (5-star 2 levels, 6-star 5 levels, Max 100 levels).
buffs.name: Inner Passion
